title: 32% "Unspecified error has occurred" SOLUTION!!
body:
hello fellow summoners,
after searching the forums and searching through google..etc i finally found the solution for this problem 

"Some players recieve an error message when attemting to download the patch 4.16 update. Here is an easy fix:

Step 1) Open windows explorer.

Step 2) Navigate to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0. 1.107"

Step 3) Inside the 0.0.1.107 folder create an empty file called: S_OK 
It must be all caps and it *MUST NOT HAVE A FILE TYPE EXTENSION.* To create a blank file just create a notepad file or something and remove the .txt.

Step 4) Close the LoL launcher/updater and re-open it.

Step 5) You have now bypassed the missing file and the patch will finish succesfully!

Credit to reijkobayashi for discovering the fix."

written by BudoBoy07

And here is the original link : http://forums.eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=754194 

Cheers !

Note: since this was an old post, the 0.0.1.107 folder is now called 0.0.1.129

replies.body:
I LOVE U! 

finaly a fix that works for me!

thx Bro/Sis

wut

I'd like to know the reasoning behind this. I'll save it for later use, because I'm still getting this bug on a regular basis.

Weird as.
